tweet: Last week we achieved one of the most important milestones in #IOTA history: the launch of the Pollen network! It's amazing to watch the fully #decentralized network evolve and mature w/ our ecosystem. We have an exciting roadmap of new features, use cases and #DApps ahead of us.  https://t.co/CoC8JGpaGK

Finally, #Pollen was launched to test our new Fast Probabilistic Consensus mechanism. Since launch, all double spends registered by the network were resolved w/ full agreement by all nodes. It's a great (early) achievement. More testing, attacking & validating to follow! #IOTA

We wanted to share some interesting (and very early) stats from #Pollen:  1. Over 280,000 messages have been sent between node operators with value transactions accounting for over 20,000 of them!  #IOTA
It's been a week since the birth of the #Pollen Network, the first fully decentralized testnet for #IOTA 2.0.  https://t.co/RpJGFfTPB4

3. The confirmation time for a message on the #Pollen network is 10 to 12 seconds! This means that it takes roughly 10 seconds for a message or #IOTA token to reach its destination. This represents a 20x performance improvement from the current mainnet.
4. We’ve really made it a point to work on the usability/ux of running a node. Currently, memory consumption to run a #Pollen node is 340MB on average, with CPU usage at 3.5%.  #IOTA
1/2 That‘s exactly where the @ObjectMgmtGroup comes into play. They had 2 sessions on #IOTA during their June session two weeks ago (#Tangle #Node and #Client). Have to check on the results, though.

Quite some work, but I think it's worth it: The new @HelloIOTA Roundup is here: 🇬🇧:  https://t.co/7Lgg8zuFrR 🇩🇪:  https://t.co/PIUaMPUWwB #usecasesgoup #partnerships #news #future #coordicide #alarmbells #IOTA #IoT #IIoT @Vrom14286662 @iotatokennews @senseering
It's always something "impossible" , until someone comes along and solve it #IOTA

5/5 AMA Summary: - exciting projects to use and earn #IOTA -> soon - intrinsic rewards for node operator -> soon - Nodes get paid for DApps -> soon - larger exchanges -> hopefully soon "this is definitely the most exciting time in our history"
Oh guys, seeing all the work becoming a reality is awesome.  ❤️👏👏 #IOTA
